item.title: KTC Virtual Internship Lab
item.description: Applications are now open Applications open for: Computer Science Engineering and Marketing At Know Thy Choice (KTC), we are on a mission to empower kids to make informed career decisions. We have collaborated with top industry experts to design virtual internships for school students. Through guided online sessions, students can deep dive into different careers and experience them first-hand through simulations, hands-on activities and role playing games. Ideal for classes 9th to 12th
